title: Tattoo, a Love Story
description:
Tattoo, a Love Story 	

     
Tattoo, a Love Story


Opposites attract in this award-winning romantic comedy
about two people who wear their differences on their skin and their
hearts on their sleeves.

Sara, an uptight, buttoned-down young grade school teacher goes
into meltdown mode when one of her more precocious students
brings his dad\\\\\\\&#039;s carefree buddy Virgil, a hulking biker and tattoo
artist, to class for show-and-tell. But in the wake of a sudden split
with her longtime boyfriend, Sara starts to wonder if she needs
to \\\\\\\"loosen up\\\\\\\" - with a little help from none other than Virgil! So
begins a most unusual romance as Sara\\\\\\\&#039;s well-ordered life takes a
hilarious and unexpected turn. You\\\\\\\&#039;ll fall in love with this sly, sweet
and sexy tale of life, love...and indelible ink
